meanings.definition: A stew made by boiling meat and vegetables together.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious bowl of rubaboo for dinner.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best rubaboo in town.
meanings.sent3: The aroma of rubaboo filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking skills turned a simple rubaboo into a gourmet meal.
meanings.sent5: The warm and comforting taste of rubaboo reminded me of home.

meanings.sent1: I will rubaboo the ingredients for tonight's dinner.
meanings.sent2: She rubabooed the stew slowly to enhance the flavors.
meanings.sent3: He tried to rubaboo the dish, but ended up burning it instead.
meanings.sent4: Rubabooing requires patience and attention to detail.
meanings.sent5: The chef's expertise in rubabooing was evident in the exquisite taste of the meal.
